meta.supportDescription: Support and help for SpoolFlux – filament management via NFC (OpenSpool compatible).

about.title: About SpoolFlux
about.body: SpoolFlux makes managing your 3D printer filaments easier than ever: hold your iPhone near the NFC tag on your filament spool and the material, brand, color, and recommended printing temperatures are read automatically.
bullets: NFC scan of filament spools (material, brand, color, temperatures)
Create your own NFC tags (PLA, PETG, ABS, TPU, ASA, Nylon, or generic)
Store extruder & heated-bed temperatures directly on the tag
Compatible with the open OpenSpool standard

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.a1: SpoolFlux currently still requires an iPhone with NFC support and iOS 26.
faq.a2: In practice, many NFC tags work reliably (e.g., NTAG21x). The important part is that the tag has enough memory for the OpenSpool data.
faq.q3: Why can't my tag be read?
a3Bullets: Is NFC enabled, and are you holding the iPhone close enough to the tag?
Is the tag writable, or possibly locked?
Is the tag positioned correctly (with some spools, a different spot works better)?
faq.q4: How do I report a bug?
faq.a4: Please send a short description + iPhone model + iOS version + app version to: reimarmetzen@gmail.com

s1.title: 1. Introduction
s1.body: This Privacy Policy explains how SpoolFlux ("we", "us", "our") handles your data when you use our mobile application.

s2.title: 2. Data Collection
s2.body2: The app works completely offline and locally on your device. We do not collect, store, or transmit any usage data, including:
bullets: No crash reports containing personal data

s3.title: 3. NFC Functionality
s3.body: SpoolFlux uses your iPhone’s NFC feature to read and write filament information to NFC tags. This data is:
bullets: Processed only locally on your device
Not shared with us or any third parties

s4.title: 4. Data Storage
s4.body: All data you enter in the app or scan remains locally on your iPhone. We have no access to this data.

s5.title: 5. Third-Party Services
s5.body: SpoolFlux does not use any third-party services, including:

s6.title: 6. Children
s6.body: Our app is intended for users aged 4 and above. Since we do not collect data, there are no special privacy concerns for children.

s7.title: 7. Changes to this Privacy Policy
s7.body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be published on this page.

s8.title: 8. Hosting (GitHub Pages)
s8.body: This website is provided via GitHub Pages. When you access the site, GitHub automatically processes technical access data (e.g., IP address, date/time, requested page, browser information) to deliver the website and ensure security/stability. SpoolFlux itself does not collect personal data.
